channel.title: Eric Nguyen's Personal Website on airicbear

item.title: Termux dwm Guide
item.description: Installation Apps Termux VNC Viewer Termux Within Termux, execute the following commands: pkg install x11-repo dwm st tigervnc echo "dwm &" > ~/.vnc/xstartup echo "export DISPLAY=\":1\"" >> ~/.bashrc Notes: You can replace dwm with your preferred window manager such as openbox (I tried i3, but it didn’t work for whatever reason). We install st terminal here, but you can use whichever terminal you prefer that is available in Termux (e.

item.title: About
item.description: Introduction Hi! I’m Eric Nguyen, but I go by the alias, “airicbear”, online. I’m a freshman at the main campus of Temple University majoring in Data Science with a concentration in computation and modeling. In my free time, I like to surf the web, learn new technologies, and dance. I don’t really use mainstream social media much anymore, due to tracking concerns; with the exceptions being Twitter and GitHub.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email: drunkenhazard(at)gmx[dot]com Discord: drenching_rain#1423 GitHub: airicbear Keybase: airicbear Matrix: @airicbear:matrix.org Twitter: @airicbear
